channel.title: disegnomalerrimo
channel.description: major updates of disegnomalerrimo's personal website

ul.li: Hello, fellow netizens! (o´▽`o) Today I updated my journal with a NEW SKETCH DUMP
I also recently updated the section where I talk about my personal use of websites and SNS/social media in the internet page
And I created a new page on my collection about my favourite horror movies!
I hope you'll have a wonderful day/night! BYE!
